mapper.insert: INSERT into eval_ud_log (user_id, ad_no, updown) values (#{userId},#{adNo},#{upDown})
mapper.select: select avg(eval1_avg) eval1Avg, avg(eval2_avg) eval2Avg, avg(eval3_avg) eval3Avg, avg(eval4_avg) eval4Avg, avg(eval5_avg) eval5Avg, avg(eval6_avg) eval6Avg from h_school WHERE school_cate1 = (SELECT school_cate1 FROM h_school WHERE school_code = #{schoolCode})

select avg(eval1_avg) eval1Avg, avg(eval2_avg) eval2Avg, avg(eval3_avg) eval3Avg, avg(eval4_avg) eval4Avg, avg(eval5_avg) eval5Avg, avg(eval6_avg) eval6Avg from u_school WHERE type = (SELECT type FROM u_school WHERE code = #{schoolCode})
